game

Class PickCharacters

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.PickCharacters

  • public class PickCharacters
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstraction of the pick of characters. This class create a deck used by the players at the beginning of each round to choose their characters. The class also create deck for iteration which is used at each round to iterate in the order of apparition of each character. The deck and the deck for iteration are the same except that the first deck is shuffled.
    Author:
    bpotiron
